title: Fundamentals of Vibe Coding
description: Master the basics of modern web development with hands-on projects and real-world applications. This comprehensive course covers everything from HTML and CSS to JavaScript, React, and modern development practices.

modules.title: Getting Started with Web Development
modules.description: Learn the fundamentals of web development and set up your development environment.

lessons.title: Introduction to Web Development
lessons.description: Learn what web development is and how the web works.

lessons.title: Setting Up Your Development Environment
lessons.description: Install and configure the tools you need for web development.

lessons.title: Creating Your First HTML Page
lessons.description: Write your first HTML code and understand the basics of web structure.

modules.title: HTML Fundamentals
modules.description: Master HTML structure, semantic elements, and best practices.

lessons.title: HTML Document Structure
lessons.description: Understand the basic structure of HTML documents.

lessons.title: Semantic HTML Elements
lessons.description: Learn to use semantic elements for better accessibility and SEO.

lessons.title: Personal Portfolio Website
lessons.description: Build a complete personal portfolio using HTML.
